page.title: 06Customs & Ghost Stories 2
page.content: At{Callow's Leap}it is said that a mighty hunter,named Callow,leaped down the precipice.Callow's Grave is said to be in the Tenbury neighbourhood.At the former place sights unearthly are seen at night,hideous black dogs running about. There once was a vicar in Tenbury and he was married.His wife annoyed him,so he went mad and killed her.He put her in a room and blocked it up. The next people who lived there heard knocks and scratches and cries for help,through the wall. They unblocked it and found a woman's skeleton. { Father Christmas}comes to Tenbury every year.He comes on a sleigh pulled by two shire horses.He brings presents for every child in the town.Normally the presents are oranges and sweets.
